creator: Vihart
descriptionHtml:
Find out the answers of all questions and conquer the transformation of your destiny through the Alethiometer Magic Oracle.

The Alethiometer was invented by Heinrich Khunrath in Germany in the 17th century with the idea to be used for astrological purposes, however the oracle already was looking magical and promissor.

The fortune teller device was improved later by inserting symbols, with this the Alethiometer was ready to find answers and transform the destiny of who owns it.

To interpret the Alethiometer Magic Oracle does not require a skill or study. The way to be part of this experience is just to choose the symbol which matches the most with your doubt or question by selecting it through the silver pointer.

To rotate the silver pointer clockwise, touch and hold the right side of the Alethiometer or touch the left side, to rotate it anti-clock wise.

Each time you stop at a symbol you will see its theme and meaning on the top of the screen.

When you are ready, touch the center of the Alethiometer app, which will start the sequence to get your answer.

Let's take an exemple, if your question is: Should I travel next summer? You can choose the HORSE symbol - Europe, Journeys, Fidelity. The needles of the Alethiometer will begin to move around the dial and stop at some symbols, which will get certain meanings and form the sequence of the answer. It is very important to use your intuition and feeling to interpret the response. Pay attention in the order of words and focus for meaning in each one. In this case, the Alethiometer has chosen the words: Change, Protection, Truth, Autumn. You must put those meanings together and create the final answer by association and interpretation: Wait, maybe it's better to travel during the Autumn.

Main Features of Alethiometer Magic Oracle:

• Enhance your ability to take decisions;
• Elegant and intuitive interface;
• Complete 3D experience;
• Dynamic and static camera mode:
• Increase your association and interpret skills;
• Minimalist design for better user experience;
• A special glossary to help you in the search for answers.

Use the Alethiometer Magic Oracle for mystical guidance, live your destiny plenty!
descriptionShort: Use the Alethiometer Magic Oracle for mystical guide, find the answers now!
